Author: dotnet
Title: On .NET Live | Infrastructure as Code with Pulumi
Description:
What if you could define, deploy, and manage your entire cloud infrastructure with the same languages, tools, and workflows you already use for application code? In this week's episode, co-host Cam Soper takes a turn as a guest to show us Pulumi, an open source Infrastucture as Code platform that uses common languages--including C# and F#--to define and deploy infrastructure on any cloud platform!
